1.content: The Taimanin are a group of anti-demon ninjas born from the superpowered Magi species of human beings, dedicated to combating and eliminating corruption and injustice caused by many kinds of diabolical demons and evil people. The Taimanin become a more prominent fighting force in the 21st century, organized by the Japanese government to fight crime and demonic influences across the country. Along with the Justice Alliance, the Taimanin is one of the two largest crime-fighting forces in all of Japan.

2.content: Gosha Village is the headquarters of the Gosha Taimanin, born from the assembly of several shinobi and clans who were originally scattered across Japan. Gosha Village is currently located somewhere hidden in the Kanto region of Japan and has been built near ancient forests and mountains. It has a population of 10000 people. Roughly a year after the "ONT Conflict", the village was made into the headquarters for the Taimanin clans by the Japanese government. It is hidden and protected with the help of modern technology, Ninja Arts from specific individuals, and the surrounding forest. Information about the hidden village is suppressed by the government and Section Three. The village is currently overseen by the Igawa clan, specifically by Asagi Igawa.

3.content: Gosha Academy is the headquarters and training ground for Taimanin. It is located in Gosha Village, and both are government protected secrets. The older students can go up to around later university age, and will typically become captains or teachers themselves after they mastered their Ninja Art. The new Gosha Academy complex has many typical rooms and buildings, normal classroom, principal's office, male and female dormitory, baths, swimming pool, large yard and cafeteria. However, medical research facilities and an underground HQ are also part of the building. The new academy building, which lies much closer to Gosha Village, was built on top of an underground temple complex, and features a large library and a Holographic Training Room. The old academy building, which lies at the outskirts of Gosha Village and close to the Virgin Forest, contained a very large underground HQ but also additional empty training buildings used for urban fighting, and has recently been repurposed into an exclusive female dormitory, using the underground HQ rooms. The Gosha Academy's principal is Asagi Igawa.

4.content: Demon, is a general term for any lifeform originating from the Dark World: Orcs, Ogres, Onis, Humanoids, demi-humans, wildlife fauna and flora, amidst many other species. It can also define any lifeform of any origin that has undergone complete Demonization, like Vampires, Wraiths and so on. Demons can also be identified by their general weakness to Taima Particles, which can be fatal to them. As such, most mythological and fantasy creatures tend to be classified as Demons.

5.content: The EVE chip is a computer chip which connects to the brain. Named so because of the "Adam and Eve" story, Eve giving the apple of knowledge but also bringing sin with it. Placed on the brain stem of a person, it will use subliminal brainwashing, pushing a person to make lewd choices without ever noticing hard mind control. Overtime, it rewrites how a person thinks, making suggestions seem reasonable and make them seem like once own idea. Causes headaches when the subject has negative thoughts about any sexual training, and stops when compromised or positive thoughts are reached. As a result, those implanted repeat their sexual choices again and again to avoid pain, and they do no longer doubt that everything is the result of their own choices. People with strong will experience stronger headaches, but will always find an excuse for actions they take as "necessary". Unlike other brainwashing technology, it keeps the overall personality intact. Which in the case of Taimanin can be useful in the later use of spies or soldiers. Affected, might become slaves by their own will and do not suffer typical regrets over it. The chip can be implanted by surgery, there is a method of attaching it to a weapon, with Nanomachines which enter the bloodstream by cut wounds and move the chip to the brain. As a result, a single scratch can be enough, to brainwash a target over a certain timeframe.

entries.name: EVE chip
entries.content: The EVE chip is a computer chip which connects to the brain. Placed on the brain stem of a person, it will use subliminal brainwashing, pushing a person to make lewd choices without ever noticing hard mind control. Overtime, it slowly rewires how a person thinks, making perverted suggestions seem reasonable and make them seem like once own idea. Causes headaches when the subject has negative thoughts about any sexual training. As a result, those implanted repeat their sexual choices again and again to avoid pain, and they do no longer doubt that everything is the result of their own choices. People with strong will experience stronger headaches, but will always find an excuse for actions they take as "necessary". Unlike other brainwashing technology, it keeps the overall personality intact. Which in the case of Taimanin can be useful in the later use of spies or soldiers. After some time, the affected might become slaves by their own will without suffering typical regrets over it. The chip can be implanted by surgery, there is a method of attaching it to a weapon, with Nanomachines which enter the bloodstream by cut wounds and move the chip to the brain. As a result, a single scratch can be enough, to brainwash a target over a certain timeframe.

entries.name: Yomihara
entries.content: Yomihara is a hidden underground city, located deep below Tokyo. It is known as one of "Hell's Cities", houses one of the greater Demon Gates that connects it to the border town Gate City in the Dark World. The normal streets are paved with concrete, and the ceiling is full of vents, power cords, water and gas pipes to power the city's infrastructure and facilities. Most buildings are either very tightly crammed together or chaotic in construction, while others are hidden by magic. It's a city full of corrupted humans, demons and all kinds of illegal activities. Trade with weapons, slaves, drugs and illegal demon magic/technology are the norm. Yomihara houses many extreme red-light areas, in which most people are not able to survive for many years or go insane.
